title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/6/19
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/6/19
description:
George Noory and Homeland Security Department consultant Dr. Peter Pry explore his efforts to protect the nation's power grid from failing due to a terrorist cyber attack or solar flares.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
